column2: Organizational cybersecurity policy is established and communicated
Risk management activities are reviewed and adjusted.
Baseline of operations/data flows established & managed
Resources are prioritized based on classification, criticality, and business value.
Communications and control networks are protected
The network is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events
Monitoring for unauthorized changes in external systems is performed
Public relations are managed during incidents
Incident response information is shared with stakeholders.
Recovery policies and procedures established and maintained
Recovery status is communicated with stakeholders.
